snippet.title: CAR! Cinematic Trailer
snippet.description:
Go Download Today! (only if you want :] )
https://samstephenson.me.uk/car/
https://cbbcsa-games.itch.io/car

// To learn more about BAFTA and the Young Game Designers Awards, Check out their page linked below!
https://samstephenson.me.uk/ygd24

———
CAR! is a simple game set against a mountain backdrop under a nice blue sky. With the player controlling the car, traverse down the road, whilst trying not to fall off and avoiding obstacles along the way.
———

The use of the word 'Cinematic' here only refers to the fact that it doesn't show literal gameplay of CAR, but rather different camera angles, of someone playing car.
